sentences.sentence: Alongside an image of King David playing the harp are the words, "Dominus inluminatio mea" and underneath "Dryhten inlihtnis mine" (" the Lord is my light ").
sentences.translation: 在大卫王弹奏竖琴的身影之下是这样的两行文字：“Dominus inluminatio mea”和“Dryhten inlihtnis mine”(上帝乃吾之圣光)。

sentences.sentence: It's essential to any programmer interested in this cool pattern, and the examples progress from simple to "Mr. Dominus, you're crazy" (in the complimentary sense).
sentences.translation: 对于任何对这种特别酷的模式感兴趣的程序员来说，本章内容都是必须的，其中的例子从非常简单不断一步步地转向疯狂（当然这是夸奖的语气）。
